title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Metaverse & VR-Based Social Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Digital literacy and basic comprehension of sociological concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the educational application principles of metaverse and VR technologies based on learning theories
Learners can analyze social phenomena and propose alternatives using experiential learning-based VR content
They can evaluate the connectivity between theoretical design and actual VR implementation while measuring educational effectiveness
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
